segments.text: Beijing International Airport . Would you please help me with my baggage ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly . Let's put the suitcase in the boot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . I've got just 50 minutes to go . Can we manage ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Take it easy . We should be able to make it unless we get caught in a traffic jam .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can't afford to miss my 9:40 flight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry . The traffic is smooth . You will be there in time for your flight .
segments.speaker: S2
